Text: (NYSE:CHD) CEO Matthew Farrell bought 7,000 shares of the company's stock in a transaction dated Monday, September 16th. The shares were acquired at an average cost of $71.32 per share, for a total transaction of $499,240.00. Following the completion of the transaction, the chief executive officer now owns 111,362 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $7,942,337.84.
